Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE
REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Enacts the "Public Official Virtual Currency Regulation Act"
Summary: Prohibits certain public officials and their families from engaging in unlawful virtual currency business activities.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to prohibiting certain public officials and their families from engaging in unlawful virtual currency business activities
